category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAEModelRevision_ItemRevision_default_relation
preference.preference_description: As specified by the Simulation Process Management data model, the default relationship created when an object of type ItemRevision is pasted under an object of type CAEModelRevision. The default value of the relation is "TC_CAE_Target".
